TopicTitle: Return to craft after death in EVA?

Articles.Content:
Hi

Today I landed first time on Minmus (yay!), but ended on the shadowed side of it.

Jeb the Kerbonaut decided to leave safety of the craft since he really wanted to see the sunrise. Quickly he noticed jetpack being the fastest way to travel so he jumped and accelerated towards the horizon. Little did he know about the mountains in Minmus since after travelling 8 km he had a tragic accident with the surface causing him to be disintegrated with a puff of smoke. His comrades at the craft are totally unaware of this mishap and refuse listen any controls from their overlord, waiting for Jeb to return.

So, Kerbonaut died while EVA. Game doesn't seem to accept moving the controls back to the craft.

"[" and "]" keys do not change the control target game complains: "No nearby objects to focus. Use the Map View to select distant ones."

At the Map View when I click the craft I get: "Cannot switch vessels while about to crash."

Any help?

[ and ] only work when there are other vessels within 2.5 km. However, it is strange that the second message gets displayed... Your best bet would be to return to the tracking station, and select the ship from there.

That did the trick. Thanks!

...and rest of the brave Kerbonauts returned home safely.
